# textDraggableView(_:dragSessionDidEnd:with:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the drag session has ended.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func textDraggableView(_ textDraggableView: any UIView & UITextDraggable, dragSessionDidEnd session: any UIDragSession, with operation: UIDropOperation)
```

## Parameters

- **textDraggableView**: The text view where the drag activity was started.
- **session**: The drag session of the current drag activity.
- **operation**: The operation that occurred during the drop activity.

## Handling drag session notifications

- **textDraggableView(_:dragSessionWillBegin:)**: Tells the delegate that the text has been lifted out of the text view and the user is beginning to drag the text.
